args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Suppose U ‚äÇ ‚ÑÇ is open, p ‚àà U, and f : U ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ is holomorphic, and f'(p) ‚â† 0. Then there
is an open neighborhood V of p such that f restricted to V is injective. -/
theorem exists_open_neighbourhood_on_holomorphic_injective {U : Set ‚ÑÇ} {f : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ} {p : ‚ÑÇ}
  (hU : IsOpen U) (hp : p ‚àà U) (h_hol : AnalyticOn ‚ÑÇ f U) (hder : deriv f p ‚â† 0) :
  ‚àÉ V : Set ‚ÑÇ, IsOpen V ‚àß p ‚àà V ‚àß V ‚äÜ U ‚àß InjOn f V := by sorry
